steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 24-2011. A 36-year-old 
man with headache, memory loss, and confusion.
Bienfang DC(1), McKenna MJ, Papaliodis GN, Gonzalez RG, Stemmer-Rachamimov A.

Author information:
(1)Division of Neuro-Ophthalmology, Brigham and Women's Hospital, Boston, USA.
